channel.title: Items At Death
channel.description:
My Problem -
I'm using the deltascape source and when my players are pking each other they are all complaining that the losing player doesnt drop anything is there any way to fix this and if so how.

item.title: Items At Death
item.dc:creator: @t3z2a t3z2a
item.description:
@t3z2a wrote:

public void youdied() { if(playerHasItem(5509)){ deleteItem(5509, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5510)){ deleteItem(5510, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5512)){ deleteItem(5512, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5514)){ deleteItem(5514, 1); } if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(6570, 1); } if (!isSkulled) { keepItemHandle(); } if (ProtItem) { applyProtectItemProt(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Items At Death
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Check your ApplyDead() and youdied() methods.

Read full topic
